imdb.title: Legal Notion Talk Show with Juanita Ingram
synopsis:
Legal Notion is a weekly talk show hosted by the dynamic and forward-thinking attorney, Juanita Ingram, Esq. She will utilize her professional knowledge to translate hard-hitting legal insights into everyday language that will appeal to a wide audience.
The show will highlight inspirational people, as well as examine pop culture, news and current events with a legal twist - bringing facts to the forefront of today's issues by providing legal expertise in a unique and engaging composition.
The show will feature notable guest lawyers, inspirational figures and various experts in their respective fields, to engage in stimulating interviews and round table discussions, reflecting upon the contemporary legal glam studio setting.
The show will also feature a fashion, inspirational, lifestyle, wellness and travel segment to engage the cosmopolitan professional and cultured family, alike.
Juanita Ingram is a licensed attorney with over 16 years of experience and has built a reputation as a superbly skilled practitioner and has been awarded several accolades for her service, including: The Women of Power Law Award, Distinguished Attorneys, and The Upcoming Leadership in Law Award. Juanita currently serves as an Assistance General Counsel to a publicly-traded company in the US.
Juanita is also the founder of Dress for Success Greater London, a charity focused on the advancement of women in the UK through equipping them with the clothing and the tools they need to succeed in the workplace. She is also the creator of the London-based Power of Women Awards event and the Fashion & Philanthropy Speaker Series.
Juanita is a voice of hope for young women. She travels internationally as a keynote speaker on topics such as female empowerment, style, self-worth, identity and goal attainment - inspiring, motivating and speaking life into the souls of the wounded and broken-hearted.
